author: @UnioneSarda
title: ¬´Un fatto storico: per la prima volta il candidato del centrodestra √® stato scelto da un tavolo nell‚ÄôIsola¬ª - L'Unione Sarda.it
text:
¬´√à un momento storico: per la prima volta √® la voce dei sardi a scegliere. FdI ha avuto il nulla osta da Roma per assecondare quanto noi proponevamo da mesi, cio√® che i sardi erano abbastanza maturi per scegliere il candidato presidente del centrodestra¬ª. Antonello Peru (Sardegna al Centro 20Venti) parla ancora del tavolo che gioved√¨ scorso ha indicato a maggioranza Paolo Truzzu alla guida della coalizione.
Questa scelta, contestata da Lega e Psd‚ÄôAz, rischia di avere ricadute serie sulle trattative nelle altre Regioni al voto. C‚Äô√® il rischio di un passo indietro su Truzzu?
¬´Lo stesso Salvini aveva detto che il candidato in Sardegna avrebbero dovuto individuarlo i sardi. L‚Äôok √® arrivato proprio dalle sigle nazionali, lo dimostra il fatto che quel tavolo si √® riunito una sola volta. Per questo non c‚Äô√® alcun timore¬ª.
Il presidente del Psd‚ÄôAz Antonio Moro ha parlato di ¬´tavolo truccato¬ª.
¬´Non √® stato fatto alcun colpo di mano: le sigle regionali non sono cespugli, sono alla pari con le altre e rappresentano ben diciannove consiglieri regionali. Il tavolo era legittimato e ha agito in modo democratico¬ª.
Moro dice anche che tra i partecipanti c‚Äôera chi rappresenta se stesso o poco pi√π.
¬´Un partito come il Psd‚ÄôAz, che parla di sovranit√† e autodeterminazione, oggi chiede l‚Äôintervento del tavolo nazionale. Io mi vergognerei. Noi di Sardegna al Centro 20Venti rappresentiamo una forza politica alla quale aderiscono sessanta sindaci e 350 amministratori in tutta la Sardegna. E soprattutto, siamo eletti dal popolo. Abbiamo costruito una casa con la voce del popolo sardo. Nessuno, soprattutto chi non √® eletto ed √® arrivato a fare l‚Äôassessore entrando dalla porta di servizio, si deve permettere di offendere chi √® stato votato dai sardi. Io riporto la voce dei territori che ascolto tutti i santi giorni¬ª.
Lei al tavolo di gioved√¨ scorso c‚Äôera, e di certo non ha dimostrato di essere il pi√π accomodante, anzi. Non sarebbe il caso di lavorare per compattare la coalizione evitando lo strappo di Lega e Psd‚ÄôAz?
¬´Penso che presto ci riuniremo per organizzare il tavolo che ha scelto Paolo Truzzu candidato presidente, e ci aspettiamo che partecipino anche Lega e Psd‚ÄôAz¬ª.
Lei nelle settimane scorse sembrava pi√π interessato a nomi alternativi al duo Truzzu-Solinas
¬´Nel tavolo decisivo sono arrivati solo due nomi, altrimenti avremmo valutato¬ª.
Ma di Truzzu cosa pensa?
¬´C‚Äô√® un partito, FdI, che ha un‚Äôinvestitura importante, e c‚Äôera solo il nome del sindaco di Cagliari sul piatto. Per noi conta la lealt√† e siamo convinti che Truzzu abbia piena autorevolezza, competenza e onest√† per portare avanti questo progetto. Se Forza Italia e il grande centro avessero proposto nomi alternativi, avremmo valutato. Ad ogni modo, si √® deciso su Truzzu perch√© abbiamo ritenuto che fosse il miglior traghettatore del progetto¬ª.
Perch√©, secondo lei, questa resistenza estrema di Lega e Psd‚ÄôAz?
¬´Non riesco a capirlo. Bisogna chiedere a loro le ragioni di questo attaccamento morboso¬ª.
Con l‚Äôuscita di Alleanza Sardegna l‚Äôesperienza del grande centro si √® conclusa anzitempo.
¬´Era un‚Äôaggregazione di anime con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottenere che l‚Äôindicazione del candidato avvenisse in Sardegna all‚Äôinsegna della discontinuit√† rispetto al governo uscente. Il percorso si √® concluso proprio nel momento in cui questi obiettivi sono stati centrati. Ora, ognuno far√† le sue liste, quindi il suo corso √® finito. L‚Äôesperienza sar√† replicata in seguito, in un intergruppo in Consiglio regionale¬ª.
Teme di pi√π Soru o Todde?
¬´Soru dimostra di avere quello che piace a me: coraggio e libert√†¬ª. (ro. mu.)
RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA

‚Ä¢ Sfoglia il quotidiano da tutti i dispositivi
Abbonati subito Sei gi√† abbonato? Accedi ora

¬´Non √® stato fatto alcun colpo di mano: le sigle regionali non sono cespugli, sono alla pari con le altre e rappresentano ben diciannove consiglieri regionali. Il tavolo era legittimato e ha agito in modo democratico¬ª.
Moro dice anche che tra i partecipanti c‚Äôera chi rappresenta se stesso o poco pi√π.
¬´Un partito come il Psd‚ÄôAz, che parla di sovranit√† e autodeterminazione, oggi chiede l‚Äôintervento del tavolo nazionale. Io mi vergognerei. Noi di Sardegna al Centro 20Venti rappresentiamo una forza politica alla quale aderiscono sessanta sindaci e 350 amministratori in tutta la Sardegna. E soprattutto, siamo eletti dal popolo. Abbiamo costruito una casa con la voce del popolo sardo. Nessuno, soprattutto chi non √® eletto ed √® arrivato a fare l‚Äôassessore entrando dalla porta di servizio, si deve permettere di offendere chi √® stato votato dai sardi. Io riporto la voce dei territori che ascolto tutti i santi giorni¬ª.

¬´Penso che presto ci riuniremo per organizzare il tavolo che ha scelto Paolo Truzzu candidato presidente, e ci aspettiamo che partecipino anche Lega e Psd‚ÄôAz¬ª.
Lei nelle settimane scorse sembrava pi√π interessato a nomi alternativi al duo Truzzu-Solinas
¬´Nel tavolo decisivo sono arrivati solo due nomi, altrimenti avremmo valutato¬ª.
Ma di Truzzu cosa pensa?
¬´C‚Äô√® un partito, FdI, che ha un‚Äôinvestitura importante, e c‚Äôera solo il nome del sindaco di Cagliari sul piatto. Per noi conta la lealt√† e siamo convinti che Truzzu abbia piena autorevolezza, competenza e onest√† per portare avanti questo progetto. Se Forza Italia e il grande centro avessero proposto nomi alternativi, avremmo valutato. Ad ogni modo, si √® deciso su Truzzu perch√© abbiamo ritenuto che fosse il miglior traghettatore del progetto¬ª.
Perch√©, secondo lei, questa resistenza estrema di Lega e Psd‚ÄôAz?
¬´Non riesco a capirlo. Bisogna chiedere a loro le ragioni di questo attaccamento morboso¬ª.
Con l‚Äôuscita di Alleanza Sardegna l‚Äôesperienza del grande centro si √® conclusa anzitempo.
¬´Era un‚Äôaggregazione di anime con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottenere che l‚Äôindicazione del candidato avvenisse in Sardegna all‚Äôinsegna della discontinuit√† rispetto al governo uscente. Il percorso si √® concluso proprio nel momento in cui questi obiettivi sono stati centrati. Ora, ognuno far√† le sue liste, quindi il suo corso √® finito. L‚Äôesperienza sar√† replicata in seguito, in un intergruppo in Consiglio regionale¬ª.
Teme di pi√π Soru o Todde?
¬´Soru dimostra di avere quello che piace a me: coraggio e libert√†¬ª. (ro. mu.)

author: News Agency Of Nigeria
title: Troops prevent attack on Benue community after 3-hour battle with bandits
text: The force commander commended the troops and urged them to put the setback of the loss of their colleagues behind them. Recommended articles The OPWS Force Commander, Maj.-Gen. Sunday Igbinomwanhia told newsmen in Makurdi on Saturday that the troops forced the bandits to run in disarray after a three-hour battle on Thursday. He however said two soldiers and one personnel of the Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps lost their lives in the encounter while two other soldiers sustained injuries. The OPWS force commander said those injured were rushed to Air Force Hospital in Makurdi, and are responding to treatment. He said that the troops rushed to the community when they received intelligence that bandits were heading to the area. ‚ÄùUpon inquiry, the troops discovered that suspected bandits were advancing towards the town to attack it and they immediately mobilised and proceeded to Okokolo community, about 15 km from their base at Akwu. ‚ÄúOn arrival, the troops encountered the bandits carrying out the attack on the community and subsequently engaged the criminals in a gun duel that lasted for three hours. ‚ÄúThe attack was successfully repelled with the terrorists withdrawing in disarray while evacuating their dead and wounded. ‚ÄúThe success achieved was however at a huge cost, with three of the troops paying the supreme sacrifice to prevent the killing of the inhabitants of Okokolo and the intended sacking of the community. ‚ÄúIn addition to the death of the two soldiers and one Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps personnel, two other soldiers were wounded and immediately evacuated to the Air Force Hospital in Makurdi,‚Äù he added. The force commander commended the troops and urged them to put the setback of the loss of their colleagues behind them and remain focused on the mission of ridding the state of all criminal elements. He assured the troops that the Chief of Defence Staff was strongly behind them as they battled to restore lasting peace in Benue. Igbinomwanhia appreciated Governor Hyacinth Alia for his support to OPWS and pledged that the troops would pursue the criminals to their hideouts. The News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) reports that the state Deputy Gov., Sam Ode, and the OPWS commander, had visited the troops of Sector 6 on Friday at their base in Akwu. The visit was to commiserate with them over the death of their gallant colleagues and encourage them not to give breathing space to the criminals. Ode who represented the governor, said that the state government would support the treatment of those injured. JOIN OUR PULSE COMMUNITY! Eyewitness? Submit your stories now via social or: Email: [eyewitness@pulse.ng](mailto: eyewitness@pulse.ng)

organizations.name: nigeria security and civil defence corps

author: I. P. Nova
title: Las cuatro nuevas vidas del Zendal tras la Covid: el gran centro de neurorrehabilitaci√≥n, laboratorio, SUMMA 112 y ELA
text:
Respiradores, batas, mascarillas de m√°xima protecci√≥n y miedo, mucho miedo. El Hospital Enfermera Isabel Zendal abri√≥ sus puertas el 1 de diciembre de 2020 para dar respuesta a la pandemia de la Covid-19. Una situaci√≥n sanitaria que paus√≥ Espa√±a hace ahora cinco a√±os cuando, el 14 de marzo, se decret√≥ el estado de alarma.
Tras 1562 d√≠as, el gran hospital de pandemias (√∫nico en el mundo) mira al futuro sin dejar de olvidar el pasado. Por sus pasillos ya no discurren profesionales embutidos en un EPI, sino los sanitarios del SUMMA 112 preparados para las posibles intervenciones sanitarias derivadas de las crecidas del r√≠o Henares , tan de actualidad estos d√≠as.
El Zendal se prepara para posibles pandemias con pabellones todav√≠a organizados como si se fuera a volver a parar Espa√±a por un virus mortal, pero dejando crecer en sus entra√±as un centro diurno de ELA en el que, cada d√≠a, m√°s de 60 pacientes y sus familiares reciben cuidados esenciales.
CAM
Ayuso hace balance de la Covid: se√±ala 30 errores de S√°nchez y niega una "orden" para no derivar ancianos de residencias Cinco a√±os despu√©s de aquel estado de alarma que cerr√≥ Espa√±a, el Zendal tiene tres vidas y se enfoca en su cuarta versi√≥n: ser un centro referente en la recuperaci√≥n neurofuncional que abrir√° sus puertas antes de septiembre. "¬øY si ocurre de nuevo una pandemia?" "En menos de 48 horas todo esto puede volver a convertirse en un hospital de campa√±a", responden quienes trabajan en √©l.
Para conocer la actual vida del hospital Enfermera Isabel Zendal es necesario retrotraerse a su pasado. Durante los meses de la Covid-19, el Zendal ten√≠a dos de sus tres pabellones activos. En el n√∫mero uno hab√≠a ingresos, en el segundo los pacientes m√°s cr√≠ticos y el tercero, aunque preparado, no lleg√≥ a activarse hasta que no empez√≥ la campa√±a de vacunaci√≥n. Entre los dos pabellones abiertos hubo 10.000 ingresos, muchos de ellos en la UCI y la UCRI (unidades de cuidados respiratorios intermedios).
El Pabell√≥n 2 del Hospital Zendal est√° preparado a 'modo Ifema' pero pasar√° a ser un centro de rehabilitaci√≥n neuronal. CAM
Pabellones Covid Ahora, la vida de estos tres pabellones luce completamente diferente. En el pabell√≥n 1, Madrid ha levantado el primer centro diurno para pacientes con ELA. El espacio tiene techos bajos, decoraciones que imitan a la naturaleza y deja atr√°s esas camas apiladas en grupo de cuatro sin apenas intimidad. Hay plantas, sillones, televisiones y mesas con juegos de mesa apilados.
Desde que abri√≥ sus puertas en abril de 2024, han pasado por all√≠ m√°s de 140 usuarios. Lo hacen en horario de 8 de la ma√±ana a 10 de la noche para recibir cuidados como rehabilitaci√≥n, fisioterapia, terapia ocupacional o asistencia psicol√≥gica. Pero tambi√©n para otras cosas m√°s banales, como poder ducharse con los medios adecuados (tal vez sus casas no est√©n adaptadas) o jugar al domin√≥ con un familiar que, por unas horas, no es su cuidador.
Alejandro Mart√≠nez V√©lez / Europa Press
El nuevo uso del Zendal: ahora ser√° un hospital de d√≠a para enfermos de ELA y sus familiares El centro diurno de ELA ocupa una parte del pabell√≥n, pero no todo. En el resto del espacio se va a levantar el futuro centro de neurrehabilitaci√≥n funcional que tambi√©n se extender√° por el pabell√≥n 2 y el pabell√≥n 3; aunque con diferentes funcionalidades.
Pese a todo ello, el hospital no perder√° su esencia inicial. Isabel Garc√≠a, directora de enfermer√≠a del Zendal, y Javier Mart√≠n, coordinador m√©dico del mismo, insisten en que en menos de 48 horas esos pabellones pueden volver a la esencia de la Covid-19. "No s√≥lo una pandemia sanitaria. Puede ser cualquier emergencia, desde un accidente en el aeropuerto de Barajas hasta una DANA", explican.
Exteriores del Hospital Isabel Zendal. CAM
Adem√°s, la idea es que el Zendal se pueda activar sin necesidad de que el resto de hospitales est√©n colapsados. De hecho, sus directores m√©dicos aseguran que no se ha usado nunca por picos de Covid-19 o gripe que saturan las urgencias. La explicaci√≥n responde a que el Zendal ahora no tiene profesionales en plantilla en estos pabellones y habr√≠a que captarlos.
"Este pabell√≥n n√∫mero 2 est√° todav√≠a en modo Ifema. No est√° humanizado, est√° abierto para tener una mejor gesti√≥n y control de pacientes cr√≠ticos. Pero vamos a avanzar hacia el Zendal 3.0 que se va a asemejar al centro de d√≠a ELA", explica Mart√≠n.
Un paciente del centro de ELA del Zendal recibiendo rehabilitaci√≥n. CAM
Laboratorio La sombra de la mayor crisis epidemiol√≥gica que recuerda Espa√±a sigue presente en el resto de edificios del Hospital Zendal. Prueba de ello es el edificio en el que se ubica el Laboratorio Regional de Salud P√∫blica y el SUMMA 112.
Mar Carretero, directora del laboratorio de Salud P√∫blica que abri√≥ sus puertas en abril del 2021, explica que ella y sus 46 compa√±eros trabajan d√≠a a d√≠a para que la Comunidad est√© preparada para hacer frente a cualquier tipo de virus respiratorio o bacteria. Tanto animal como en aguas y alimentos.
Rodrigo Minguez
Matute s√≠ escucha al paciente: "Hab√≠a Google Glass en el centro de ELA, pero nos ped√≠an duchas" Por resumir (grosso modo), parte del equipo de Carretero se dedica a secuenciar las cepas de neumococo que est√°n activas para que, cuando Salud P√∫blica prepare las campa√±as de vacunaci√≥n, se enfoque en las cepas m√°s comunes.
Con su traslado a Valdebebas el servicio ha crecido en espacio y poder de secuenciaci√≥n. Si ahora se analizan entre 4.000 y 8.000 muestras, dependiendo del √°rea y los repuntes epidemiol√≥gicos; durante la Covid hac√≠an frente a 86.000 de manera "continua".
El Laboratorio Regional de Salud P√∫blica comenz√≥ a funcionar en abril de 2021. CAM
SUMMA 112 Una planta m√°s abajo de este superlaboratorio, con acreditaci√≥n europea y algunos de los niveles de bioseguridad m√°s altos de la regi√≥n, se ha levantado el Centro Coordinador de Urgencias y Emergencias del SUMMA 112 que lleg√≥ a esta ubicaci√≥n en febrero de 2023.
Con sus 75 trabajadores, el SUMMA 112 atiende las llamadas sanitarias y moviliza los servicios m√©dicos cuando es necesario, aunque tambi√©n gestiona los servicios domiciliarios. Es decir, derivar ambulancias o coches de apoyo para que los pacientes acudan a citas m√©dicas.
Los profesionales del SUMMA 112 coordinan las llamadas desde este espacio. CAM
"Los pacientes llaman al 112 y al 060, un n√∫mero que estaba activo cuando la sanidad la gestionaba el Estado, pero que todav√≠a est√° en el imaginario colectivo y que, sobre todo, en personas mayores. Lo notamos sobre todo durante la Covid", explica Carmen Mendoza, subdirectora m√©dica del centro coordinador 112.
El coraz√≥n del SUMMA 112 es el que m√°s recuerda a la vida 'Covid' del Zendal. Se mantiene abierto las 24 horas al d√≠a, como cuando no se paraban de atender pacientes de coronavirus. Sus profesionales no dejan un segundo de trabajar, sea d√≠a o noche. Atiende una llamada cada 28 segundos. Igual que el hospital de pandemias , en sus 500 d√≠as abierto, vio pasar por sus muros a casi 1.000 personas.
NEWSLETTER - ESPA√ëA Recibe de lunes a viernes las noticias m√°s relevantes de la pol√≠tica nacional Apuntarme De conformidad con el RGPD y la LOPDGDD, EL LE√ìN DE EL ESPA√ëOL PUBLICACIONES, S.A. tratar√° los datos facilitados con la finalidad de remitirle noticias de actualidad.

author: MENAFN
title: Alia Bhatt Craved Bengali Delicacy 'Nolen Gur Sandesh' During Her Pregnancy | MENAFN.COM
text: When Alia Bhatt was pregnant with her first child, the star, who frequently spoke about her prenatal experience on social media, desired the Bengali delicacy nolen gur sandesh (a Bengali dessert consisting of dried milk and date palm jaggery). A celebrity nutritionist, Suman Agarwal discussed Alia Bhatt's pregnancy on The Pregnancy Podcast Show said, "I remember, throughout Alia Bhatt's pregnancy she used to call for our Gur Sandesh which is Kolkata's Nolen Gur Sandesh. Throughout the pregnancy, we have supplied that to her.'' Also Read:What gifts did celebrities give Anant Ambani, Radhika on pre-wedding? Also adding, "From the very beginning, I told myself that only if I was comfortable, will I push myself. Touchwood, my pregnancy didn't hold me back physically. Yes, the first few weeks were slightly difficult as I had major exhaustion and nausea, but at that time, I didn't talk about it because you are not supposed to say anything for the first 12 weeks, right? That's what everybody says, so I had to keep that information to myself, but I was listening to my body." Also Read:Laapataa Ladies: Salman Khan reviews Kiran Rao's film; here's what he said After giving birth to Raha, Alia spoke with TOI about her pregnancy. She stated, "I do not believe in restricting myself unless there is a physical impediment. I was pregnant, therefore there were numerous constraints since pregnancy is uncertain. I chose to live each day as it came and listen to my body. Of course, job is vital, but at that time, my kid and my health were my top priorities." Meanwhile, Alia Bhatt last appeared in 'Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahani'. The actor will next appear in 'Jigra'. MENAFN14032024007385015968ID1107978332 Legal Disclaimer: MENAFN provides the information ‚Äúas is‚Äù without warranty of any kind. If you have any complaints or copyright issues related to this article, kindly contact the provider above. Tags Comments Category Date

author: Tony M. Centeno
title: 50 Cent Shares Hilarious Reaction To Son's Request For New Music
text:
Photo: Getty Images
50 Cent had a hilarious response to his son's request for new music.
On Wednesday, December 27, the Queens, N.Y. native took to Instagram to share TMZ's coverage of their experience at Travis Scott's "Circus Maximus" tour stop in New Jersey earlier this week. The outlet uploaded footage of Sire rocking out to "Sicko Mode" during the show and even boasted Sire's flick with Scott backstage. In his post, Fif said that his young son asked him to make a new song that he can perform multiple times like Scott did for his fan favorite "FE!N."
"SIRE came back and said I need to make a New song and do it 10 times like Travis," 50 Cent wrote in his caption. "üò≥I said you need to brush your teeth and get in the bed it‚Äôs bedtime. LOLüòÜ"
50 Cent's son has been a fan of Travis Scott for some time. In fact, the G-Unit founder told Mary J. Blige earlier this year that Sire didn't even know he was famous until he recently saw him perform on tour and found out that he personally knew Scott.
For what it's worth, 50 Cent did deliver some new music in 2023. He collaborated with Nas for "Office Hours" off Magic 2 and recently teamed up with Nicki Minaj for the "Beep Beep" (Remix) from her Pink Friday 2 album. Still, Sire wants the artist-turned-film mogul to drop a solo record just like most of his fans do.
Check out footage from 50 Cent and Sire's outing at the "Circus Maximus Tour" below.

author: Aigor Oj√™da;
title: Superlua mais brilhante do ano pode ser vista hoje: como tirar boas fotos?
text:
Superlua mais brilhante do ano pode ser vista hoje: como tirar boas fotos?
1¬∫.ago.2023 - Superlua surge sobre o P√£o de A√ß√∫car, no Rio de Janeiro, por tr√°s de telef√©rico Imagem: Mauro Pimentel/AFP Do UOL, em S√£o Paulo
17/10/2024 17h29
A superlua de outubro, conhecida como Lua do Ca√ßador, dever√° iluminar o c√©u a partir desta quinta-feira (17).
O que aconteceu A lua cheia de outubro ficar√° vis√≠vel por tr√™s dias, diz a Nasa. Essa √© a terceira de quatro superluas consecutivas esperadas em 2024. As superluas est√£o aproximadamente 30% mais brilhantes e 14% maiores em rela√ß√£o √†s luas cheias tradicionais.
A superlua poder√° ser vista em todo o pa√≠s, por√©m, a visibilidade depende das condi√ß√µes meteorol√≥gicas em cada lugar. De acordo com a Nasa , a superlua deve atingir seu pico m√°ximo no in√≠cio da noite.
A Nasa se refere ao fen√¥meno quando a lua atinge menor dist√¢ncia da Terra durante a trajet√≥ria orbital lunar. A ag√™ncia espacial afirmou que as superluas ocorrem de tr√™s a quatro vezes por ano.
Segundo o Almanac.com, a superlua √© batizada como Lua do Ca√ßador por ser refer√™ncia para os ca√ßadores. Sua apari√ß√£o levava os ca√ßadores a se prepararam para o inverno que se aproximava.
Como fazer fotos do fen√¥meno Mesmo com o celular, √© poss√≠vel fazer fotos da Lua. A Nasa recomenda procurar um local est√°vel, desligar o flash e utilizar o temporizador. Al√©m disso, outra dica √© alterar o ISO ‚Äîcaso o telefone permita. Para captar a Lua, √© necess√°rio mant√™-lo baixo e com abertura ampla.
Voc√™ pode tentar tirar suas fotos durante um per√≠odo em que a Lua n√£o esteja muito mais brilhante que o c√©u, como o crep√∫sculo ou o amanhecer, para que a c√¢mera do seu telefone tenha menos contraste para lidar. Ou voc√™ pode tentar tirar uma foto enquanto a Lua surge no horizonte, quando ela tende a parecer maior.
Comunicado da Nasa, com recomenda√ß√µes

author: Billy Hull bhull@staradvertiser.com
title: Wahine survive Cal Poly to set up Big Bash vs. UCSB | Honolulu Star-Advertiser
text:
Mahalo for supporting Honolulu Star-Advertiser. Enjoy this free story! Showing the poise of an experienced team with a championship pedigree, the Hawaii women‚Äôs basketball team remained in first place by keeping its cool. Read more
Mahalo for reading the Honolulu Star-Advertiser! You're reading a premium story. Read the full story with our Print & Digital Subscription.
Subscribe Now Read this story for free: Watch an ad or complete a survey Log In Already a subscriber? Log in now to continue reading this story.
Activate Digital Account Print subscriber but without online access? Activate your Digital Account now.
Showing the poise of an experienced team with a championship pedigree, the Hawaii women‚Äôs basketball team remained in first place by keeping its cool.
Junior MeiLani McBee scored 12 of her game-high 21 points in the fourth quarter and the Rainbow Wahine closed the game on an 18-6 run to turn back a frustrated Cal Poly team 59-47 on Thursday night at SimpliFi Arena at Stan Sheriff Center.
McBee scored 12 straight points after the game was tied at 41-all and a technical foul on the Mustangs allowed Hawaii (14-9, 11-3 Big West) to score eight points in a 50-second span in the final four minutes to take back sole possession of first place in the conference before a crowd of 931.
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a difference with playing with emotions and playing emotional,‚Äù Hawaii coach Laura Beeman said. ‚ÄúI think we played with great emotion today but did not get emotional.‚Äù
Hawaii remained perfect at home in conference play at 7-0 heading into Saturday‚Äôs game against UC Santa Barbara billed as ‚ÄúBeeman‚Äôs Big Bash.‚Äù
The Gauchos remained a game behind the Rainbow Wahine in the standings with a win over UC San Diego on Thursday.
Imani Perez added five points, 10 rebounds and four blocks and helped hold reigning Big West Player of the Week Natalia Ackerman to four points and six rebounds on 2-for-7 shooting.
‚ÄúAs the season has gone on, she has become more physical,‚Äù Beeman said of Perez. ‚ÄúI think even more than she thought she wanted to be. I think she‚Äôs stronger, she gets off the ground fast and she can elevate and have her hands on the ball.‚Äù
The game was tied 41-41 with 5:40 remaining when McBee made a 3-pointer from the left wing and then converted an and-1 reverse layup to put UH ahead by six.
After a 3-pointer by Annika Shah cut Hawaii‚Äôs lead in half, Cal Poly‚Äôs Sydney Bourbond was whistled for her fourth foul and then called for a technical foul to end her night.
McBee converted all four free throws and then added a layup to push UH‚Äôs lead to nine. Kelsie Imai followed with a spinning layup to put UH ahead by double figures.
‚ÄúThat poise was very important because it cost (Cal Poly) seven points,‚Äù McBee said.
Shah finished with a team-high 14 points for the Mustangs (13-10, 9-5), who have lost six straight to UH.
Neither team led by more than seven points in a tightly contested first half in which UH held the Mustangs to 32% shooting (8-for-25).
Jacque David capped a 7-0 UH run late in the second quarter with a layup as UH enjoyed a 14-8 advantage in points in the paint.
Shah, the Mustangs‚Äô leading scorer, ended Cal Poly‚Äôs 1-for-11 funk from the field with a 3-pointer with 14 seconds left in the second quarter.
Hawaii quickly pushed the ball down the floor and Lily Wahinekapu sunk a fall-away jumper from the right side to give UH a 28-22 halftime advantage.
Cal Poly cut the deficit in half heading into the fourth quarter, closing with four points in the final 43 seconds.
‚ÄúI thought we played a little frustrated for the first three-and-a-half quarters and I don‚Äôt know why,‚Äù Beeman said. ‚ÄúI thought we had a really good timeout where a few of the players really took over and talked about the adjustments we needed to make, talked about our energy and talked about why we were playing so frustrated.‚Äù
Sidney Richards ended a five-minute Cal Poly scoring drought with a layup in the paint and Sierra Lichtie sunk two free throws in the final two seconds after Daejah Phillips had a bucket taken away due to a questionable offensive foul that could have made it an eight-point UH lead.
Richards made two free throws with 8:30 remaining to give Cal Poly its first lead since it scored the first basket of the game.
Wahinekapu answered with a three-point play at the other end to put UH back in front and it never trailed again.
McBee‚Äôs second 3 pushed her past Julissa Tago into fourth place on UH‚Äôs career 3s made list with 141.
